name: Idle Gas Station!
description:
Run the most efficient gas station and make sure all cars leave your premises filled up. Keep expanding your gas station business to be able to accommodate all cars!

Use your hard earned money to buy upgrades:

- Expand the number of gas pumps
- Buy advertising for your gas station
- Raise up prices for your excellent car service

With all that you will quickly dominate the market and become the best gas station in the area!

As you rise up in popularity and level up, more and more different and varied cars will start entering your gas station. Discover all of them!
